docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: In prime time, teen-agers are generally preoccupied with dating and being cool. School is boring and parents are silly. In its eagerness to entertain, commercial television has few qualms about being superficial in its selling of role models. But then, network executives are quick to point out, there are those occasional afternoon specials intended specifically for young audiences.

headline.main: Review/Television;   A Warning to the Young On Dangers of Steroids
